summary: Defines lightweight proxy objects that mimic Django model fields but are not actual database columns, primarily to expose the hidden ordering column used when a model specifies 'order_with_respect_to'. These proxies enable uniform handling of such internal attributes across the ORM, migrations, and serialization processes.
business_intent: Allow developers and Django internals to read and write the automatically created ordering field as if it were a normal model field, simplifying ordering logic, migration generation, and model deconstruction without requiring specialâ€‘case code.
